bug.author: gaterbyte
bug.description:
Describe the bug v1.0.0RC2 Image Flash Results in a Kernel Panic To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Download image file use Etcher to flash insert micro sdcard into pi and power on
Expected behavior When Reverting back to "pwnagotchi-raspbian-lite-master.img" pi boots normally.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5060500/66686492-7fe9e400-ec34-11e9-942a-2e468bfe0df7.jpg></denchmark-link>
Environment (please complete the following information):
pwnagotchi-raspbian-lite-v1.0.0RC2 Pi 0 W 32GB Pny SD card, inateck usb/ethernet hub, mini-hdmi to monitor

comments.comment: does the release SHA256 match with your zip?

cd498ed144f464068dcab6f7648460803df242baa8a0f940054094035ffcfb52 pwnagotchi-raspbian-lite-v1.0.0RC2.zip f8d6ad92a4d0d0760850330379d1254c9e4d2ba8f4841d2563b1032ab4eb505b pwnagotchi-raspbian-lite-v1.0.0RC2.img Which are different from what you posted... Let me try to re-download and report back.
Pull via wget verses chrome download, and sha256 now matches. Confirmed working image with correct sha256!
